content.rendered:
Source Code:
https://github.com/A5H73Y/Carz
https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/carz.56255/
Donation Link:
https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=3NPKZUHM8G4H6

​

Do you have a server that has a city theme? Want to add more realism by being able to drive a car on any surface? Then this is the perfect plugin for your server!

Add a whole new level of role-play into your server, by creating streets, drive-through buildings, car shops, fuel stations, anything you can think of!

With the ability to upgrade your car, you can perform street races and stunts that everybody will enjoy!

​
  • Drive Minecarts anywhere on land!
  • Upgrade your car’s speed
  • Fuel management system
  • Car ownership system
  • Drive up and down roads
  • Perfect for any role-play / city server!
  • Economy and permission support
  • Install and play – No configuration needed
  • Automatic update checker
​

Installation is made incredibly easy. Simply drag and drop the plugin in to your “/plugins” folder and restart the server.
There is no configuration changes required for the plugin to work, everything will be set to my default suggestion to minimize conflicts with the server.
If you want to get the most of the plugin and fully customize it to your liking, I suggest you take some time to look at the config yml file and amend it to best suit your server.

Need support or have a question?

Like the plugin? Consider leaving a review. 🙂
